[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25.3″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.25.3″]

FAQs

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25.3″ global_module=”1297″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”3.25.3″][et_pb_accordion_item title=”When does the recruitment program start at IIT Gandhinagar?” open=”on” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em”]

Placement Hiring Season starts from first week of October and Internship Hiring Season starts from Mid August. We encourage recruiters to conduct interview process for full time and internships ( Summer Internship, Winter Internship and More than 3 months Internship ); simultaneously during their visit. Certain pre-placement process (e.g. online tests, PPT) may be conducted before scheduled interview process date

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”What kind of collaborations do IITGN have?” open=”off” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em”]

The Institute has developed strategic partnerships with leading universities, industries and R&D organizations within India and abroad for student and faculty exchanges and research collaborations. The Institute has active exchanges or MoUs with the California Institute of Technology; Ecole Nationale Superriere d’Arts et Metiers, France; ICSTE, Switzerland; Institute Superieur D’Electronique De Paris, France; Instituto Universitario de Lisboa, Portugal; Israel Institute of Technology Haifa; Notre Dame University; SAC-ISRO, Physical Research Laboratory Ahmedabad; Ricoh Corporation, Japan; Underwriters Laboratories, Chicago; University of Saskatchwan, Canada; University of Strathclyde, UK, among others

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Brief about Faculty Members at IITGN” open=”off” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em”]

IITGN promotes excellence in science and technology, as well as the humanities and social sciences. The Institute only recruits candidates with excellent academic records, demonstrated potential for excellence in research, and broad academic outlooks for faculty positions. More details at: https://www.iitgn.ac.in/faculty

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”What are the different ways in which a company can hire students from the campus?” open=”off” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em”]

  • By conducting campus placement drive for the final year students – Full Time hiring
  • By recruiting for internship ( Summer Internship, Winter Internship and More than 3 months internship ) & extending Pre Placement Offer to them

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”How many slots / companies will be there per day during the placement drive?” open=”off” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em”]

Typically, upto three companies per day

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Is there any fee associated with the process?” open=”off” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em”]

No

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”From which courses students are available for recruitment, this year?” open=”off” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em”]

  • B.Tech: Chemical, Civil, Electrical, Mechanical, Computer Science and Engineering, Materials Science & Engineering
  • M.Tech: Chemical, Civil, Electrical, Mechanical, Computer Science and Engineering, Materials Science & Engineering, Biological Engineering, Earth System Science
  • M.Sc: Chemistry, Cognitive Science, Mathematics, Physics
  • M.A: Society & Culture
  • PhD: Biological, Chemical, Chemistry, Civil, Cognitive Science, Computer Science & Engineering, Earth Sciences, Electrical, Humanities and Social Sciences, Materials Science & Engineering, Mathematics, Mechanical, Physics

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”How to reach the campus?” open=”off” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em”]

  • By Road: Link for the google map location: goo.gl/yjje0c
  • By Train: Nearest railway station is Ahmedabad Junction ( ADI ) – 28 KM – 40-50 minutes drive
  • By Air: Nearest airport is Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport ( AMD ) – 24 KM – 30-40 minutes drive

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Is there any number / email, we can reach out to in case there are any queries?” open=”off” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em”]

Yes, Please call us anytime at +91 7069021641 or write to us at cds@iitgn.ac.in

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”What kind of information do the students expect in PPTs?” open=”off” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em”]

Brief profile of Organization, Achievements, Employee Strength, CSR Activities, Future growth of an employee, Profile of work, Compensation details & breakup, Retirement benefits etc.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”On what basis is the slot allotted to a company for the final placement? Slotting is done subject to the following parameters:” open=”off” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em”]

  • Student Preferences
  • Work profile
  • Compensation package
  • Career Prospects
  • Student Intake
  • Past track record

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Is there any facility for the accommodation available on the campus?” open=”off” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em”]

Yes, Recruitment team can stay at IIT Gandhinagar guest house (Subject to availability).

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”What are the typical steps in the recruitment process?” open=”off” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em”]

The process may contain one or more of these steps:

Pre placement talk – Resume Shortlist – Written/Online Screening Test – Group Discussion – Technical Interview – HR Interview – Offer

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”What are the infrastructural facilities available on the campus for the placement process?” open=”off” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em”]

  • GD & Interview rooms,
  • Teleconferencing and video conferencing facility,
  • Computer lab for online tests,
  • Auditorium,
  • Lecture halls,
  • Seminar and conference rooms for presentations,
  • Fully furnished guest house (subject to availability),
  • Pickup & Drop service from Airport & Railway station (subject to availability),
  • Round the clock assistance
  • Highly motivated and experienced staff to coordinate the whole process.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”What is the duration for Internships?” open=”off” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em”]

Summer Internship: Students can join from Mid May till last week of July
Winter Internship: First week of December till 25th December
More than Three Months of Internship: Generally an entire semester ( Aug to Nov OR Jan to Apr ), Can be discussed

 

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Where can I get a recruitment guide?” open=”off” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em”]

Contact Mr. Saumil Shah (Sr. Executive officer – CDS) on +91 7069021641 or write at saumils@iitgn.ac.in

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Names of some of the past recruiters at IIT Gandhinagar ?” open=”off” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em”]

      Aarti Industries Ltd, Aasaanjobs Pvt Ltd, Accenture, Achnet Technologies Inc, Adcuratio, Addverb Technologies, Adobe, ADP Pvt Ltd, Adsom Globaltech, Affine Analytics Private Limited, Alkyl Amines Chemicals Ltd, All On Block Corporation, Amazon, Amnex Infotechnologies Pvt Ltd, Analog Devices India Pvt Ltd, Apttus Software, Arvind Infrastructure, Atkins, Banas Dairy, BANCO PRODUCTS (I) LTD, Barclays, Belcan India Pvt Ltd, Bharat Dynamics Ltd, Bharat Electronics Ltd, Bharat Forge Ltd, Bharat Heavy Electricals, Bharat Light & Power, Bharat Petroleum Corporation Ltd, Bombardier Transportation India Pvt Ltd, Bosch Rexroth (India) Pvt Ltd, Byte Prophecy Pvt Ltd, Cadila Pharmaceuticals Ltd, Campus Students Communities Pvt Ltd, Capgemini Technology Services Pvt Ltd, CGI, Chhajed Foods Pvt Ltd, Chola MS Risk Services, Clumio Technologies India LLP, Codenation Solutions LLP, Cogitate Technology Solutions, Cognizant Technology Solutions, Cygnet Infotech Pvt Ltd, D.E. Ltd., SIM Advisory, SKAPS Industries India Pvt Ltd, Smartprix, Sophos, SRF Ltd, Starhome Mach, Steel Strips Wheels Ltd, Sterlite Technologies Ltd, Strand Life Sciences, Synopsys, TATA Chemicals Ltd, Tata Consultancy Services, TATA Consulting Engineers Ltd., Tata Motors, Technoforte Software Pvt Ltd, Testbook, Texas Instruments, Thornton Tomasetti, Timetooth Technologies, Tipping Mr. Pink Pvt Ltd, Tonichi Insatsu Co., Ltd, Toppr, Trading Technologies India Pvt Ltd, Tridiagonal Solutions Pvt Ltd, United Health Group, Vassar Labs IT Solutions Pvt Ltd, VE Commercial Vehicles Pvt Ltd, Vijña Labs – The Manipal Group, Walter P Moore, Wipro, Worley, ZS Associates Pvt Ltd

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”What is the timeline for recruitment process every year ?” open=”off” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em”]

FOR PLACEMENT:

CDS approaches Organizations: June onwards
PPT Slots: Mid August onwards
Test Slots: First week of September onwards
Date Allotment to Companies: Mid September onwards
Placement Commences: First Week of October

FOR INTERNSHIP:
CDS approaches Organizations: June onwards
Recruitment Process: Mid August onwards

No Placement/Internship Activities due to exams: Last week of September

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Discipline wise research areas at IITGN?” open=”off” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0em” closed_title_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0em”]

  • Chemical Engineering: Nanotechnology, Colloids and Interfaces, Chemical Reaction Engineering, Separation Processes, Polymers, Process Control
  • Civil Engineering: Structural Engineering, Geotechnical Engineering and Water-Resources Engineering
  • Electrical Engineering: Microelectronics, Signal Processing, Fiber Optics, Power Systems, Control Systems, Electrical Machines, VLSI Design, Biomedical Engineering
  • Materials Science and Engineering: Metallurgy, Nanomaterials, Biomaterials
  • Mechanical Engineering: Thermal Science and Engineering, Dynamics and Control, Solid Mechanics

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

We encourage recruiters to conduct interview process for full time and internships ( Summer Internship, Winter Internship and More than 3 months Internship ); simultaneously during their visit. Certain pre-placement process (e.g. online tests, PPT) may be conducted before […]
